execution_quality: Agent executed a single bash command to verify the display status after the hardware change, completing the requested check efficiently.
work_category: Follow-up diagnostic check after user indicated potential resolution by removing an external drive from a USB dongle.
summary: Agent successfully executed the requested check after the user removed the external drive. The quick response and focused execution matched the user's intent, though the underlying display issue context suggests the diagnostics may still be inconclusive.
follow_up_pattern: User informed agent of action taken and requested verification, then asked for another check
